content.text:
# Draft:98th Academic Awards

The 98th Academy Awards ceremony, presented by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences (AMPAS), will honor the best films of 2025, and is scheduled to take place at the Dolby Theatre in Hollywood, Los Angeles, California. In March 2025, the release date was announced, along with the fact that Conan O'Brien would return to host after receiving universal acclaim for hosting the previous year.
The nominees will be announced on January 22, 2026. Beginning with this ceremony, the Academy will begin enforcing rules ensuring that all members have watched every nominated film in each category before voting in the final round.
